sql.name: INSERT_LIBRARYBOOK_SQL

sql.name: LIST_LIBRARYBOOK_SQL
sql.query: SELECT LB.idnum as idNum ,LB.read_date as read_date ,LB.state as state ,LB.book_idNum as bidnum ,LB.library_idNum as lidnum ,L.user_idNum as uidNUm ,B.idNum as bidnum ,B.name as bname ,B.isbn10 as isbn10 ,B.isbn13 as isbn13 ,B.publish_comp as bcomp ,B.publish_date as bdate ,B.price as bprice ,B.cover as bcover ,B.category as category ,A.name as author FROM LIBRARYBOOK LB, LIBRARY L,BOOK B, AUTHOR A WHERE LB.state = ? AND LB.library_idNum = ? AND LB.library_idNum = L.idNum AND LB.book_idNum=B.idNum AND B.idNum=A.book_idNum AND A.author_div = 0 ORDER BY LB.idNum DESC LIMIT ?, ?

AND LB.library_idNum = L.idNum AND LB.book_idNum = B.idNum AND B.idNum = A.book_idNum AND A.author_div = 0 AND LB.library_idNum = L.idNum

sql.query: SELECT LB.idNum as idNum , LB.read_date as read_date , LB.state as state , LB.library_idnum as lidnum , L.user_idNum as uidnum , B.idNum as bidnum , B.name as bname , B.isbn10 as isbn10 , B.isbn13 as isbn13 , B.publish_comp as bcomp , B.publish_date as bdate , B.price as bprice , B.cover as bcover , B.category as category , A.name as author FROM LIBRARYBOOK LB ,( SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE name LIKE ? ) B , LIBRARY L , AUTHOR A WHERE B.idNum = LB.book_idNum AND LB.library_idNum = ?
